topic.title: API PDF Links
topic.shortdesc: The Blume Global API documentation site caters to users the instructions on how to effectively use and integrate the Blume Global API. It also provides updates on the API's lifecycle such as new versions or retirement. Some aspects of API documentation can be generated automatically via Swagger or other documents.

body.p: This section contains links to all Blume API Documentation PDFs.

entry.xref: Blume Visibility Flight Status API Integration Guide

row.entry: This guide provides instructions for integrating the Blume Visibility Flight Status API, which allows users to track the status of flights in real time.

entry.xref: Blume Visibility Geo Location API Integration Guide (Pull)

row.entry: This document explains how to integrate the Blume Visibility Geo Location API using a pull mechanism to retrieve geographical location data for tracking purposes.

entry.xref: Blume Visibility Get Event API Integration Guide (Push)

row.entry: This guide describes the process for integrating the Blume Visibility Get Event API using a push mechanism to receive real-time event notifications.

entry.xref: Blume Visibility Milestones API Integration Guide (Pull)

row.entry: This document provides instructions for integrating the Blume Visibility Milestones API using a pull method to retrieve milestone information for shipments.

entry.xref: Blume Visibility Milestones API Integration Guide (Push)

row.entry: This guide explains how to integrate the Blume Visibility Milestones API using a push method to receive real-time updates on shipment milestones.
This guide provides information on the Booking API for Beneficial Cargo Owners (BCOs), detailing how to manage and track bookings.

entry.xref: Freight Audit and Pay API Guide (Carrier)

row.entry: This document outlines the integration process for the Freight Audit and Pay API from a carrier's perspective, focusing on billing and payment processes.

entry.xref: Freight Audit and Pay API Guide (Originator)

row.entry: This guide describes how to integrate the Freight Audit and Pay API from an originator's viewpoint, covering the audit and payment initiation for freight services.
This document provides comprehensive information on the Blume Shipment Services API, covering various functionalities related to shipment management.

entry.xref: CarrierGo Work Order Restful API Documentation

row.entry: This guide details the integration process for the CarrierGo Work Order Restful API, which allows carriers to manage work orders efficiently.
